title: Professional Corki guide

embed.description: Over the past nearly 24 hours I've been practicing and researching how to play Corki. My sources were only the very best you can find on the internet. This video brings together all the best tips and hints from the internet into one video, forming the ultimate Corki guide.

body:
The video already has a description so I don't need to add too much here.
But basically if you want to be good at Corki watch this.
